cards.detail: The following medication requests(s) release rates should be re-evaluated: 12 HR Oxycodone Hydrochloride 10 MG Extended Release Oral Tablet

source.label: CDC 2016 Guideline for prescribing opioids for chronic pain

cards.summary: Recommend use of immediate-release opioids instead of extended release/long acting opioids when starting patient on opioids.
